title: Unable to connect via Foxtel Broadband?
body:
Hi,

I have been connected with Foxtel Broadband however I am unable to login past the client as it just times out on logging in. If I tether to my mobile device (Telstra) I am able to login no problems at all. I have tried port forwarding to the league of legends ports and still no success. I have changed my Dns settings as well and tried repairing/reinstalling the client. Anything else anyone recommends in order to resolve this?

replies.body: It is Riots servers. Give them your ISP details, they will contact your ISP and hopefully fix the issue. Don't play ranked in the mean time, for your team sake atleast :)

Hey nectarines,

Can you go to http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs and download the network diagnostic tool and run it. Please be sure to let it complete all the way through.
Once completed please send an email containing the log file to ocelivereports@riotgames.com including your summoner name, city and a brief description of the problem (just in case someone else sees the email before me).

We can then start looking into what could be causing this and work with you to resolve the issue.

-ToxicHawk

Hello Guys,

I'm with Foxtel as well as my broadband provider and experiencing the exact same thing. I also heard that other people that mainly on the FOXTEL broadband connection is experiencing the same issue, as soon as you either tether or use other ISP it works perfectly fine.

How do we go about fixing this? Can you please contact my ISP to get this resolved or do I have to contact them to look into this?

Hey guys, I posted in the Foxtel boards about this issue and I've just been told that it has been resolved. I won't be able to verify until 5:30 this afternoon but if someone on Foxtel could check it before then that would be great!

http://community.foxtel.com.au/t5/Technical-Support/Unable-to-connect-to-League-of-Legends/m-p/49809#M7656
yeah also with foxtel internet just stuck on logging in on oce but na/euw works fine
Disable TCP timestamps. I forgot how to do it, but it might help with authentication services.

Hi all,

Friend of mine made the switch to Foxtel a couple days ago and has not been able to log in since.  Constantly times out when attempting to log in.  Seems to be a routing issue.
